= Labs Test Geometry: Luiz =

#type: node
#context: sop
#internal: labs::testgeometry_luiz
#icon: sidefxlabs
#tags: sidefxlabs, testgeo, sidefxlabs

""" A scan of Luiz Kruel """

This geometry is a scan of Luiz Kruel, who is one of the developers of the GameDevToolset/SideFXLabs. The scan can be used for all sorts of testing purposes. If you hurt the developer, he will haunt you in your dreams.
Big thanks to Will Driscoll, who did the scan.
